abstract: In photographing the Swiss banking industry, Mark Henley faced the challenge of documenting something no one can see. Yet the pictures - like something out of a noir film - have familiar qualities.
snippet: In photographing the Swiss banking industry, Mark Henley faced the challenge of documenting something no one can see. Yet the pictures - like something out of a noir film - have familiar qualities.
lead_paragraph: With billions of dollars shrouded in secrecy - and protected by armed guards and vaults - the best Mark Henley could hope for in Switzerland was to subtly stake out his targets.
